0.cdata!:
Chad - Agricultural Services and
            Producers Organizations Project : environmental assessment

trustfund:
TF051117-PHRD-CHAD: AGRICULTURAL,
            SERVICES AND PRODUCER ORGANIZATION PROJECT,TF038661-CHAD:  AGRICULTURAL SERVICES
            & P. O. PROJECT,TF038852-CHAD - APPRAISAL OF RURAL
            DEVELOPMENT PROJECTS

abstracts.cdata!:
The Agricultural Services and Producer
            Organizations Project will promote sustainable growth in
            agricultural production and capacity building for
            agricultural services; complemented by the provision of
            infrastructure investments. This environmental assessment
            identifies the potential negative impacts such as soil and
            water pollution; sedimentation and salinization during
            construction of water management schemes; groundwater
            over-abstraction in the absence of sound construction
            techniques for pastoral wells; and, other impacts, i.e.,
            loss of flora and fauna resulting from the establishment of
            borrow pits during construction of small dams, or, increased
            use of pesticides leading to biodiversity degradation.
            Mitigation measures suggested: implementation of an
            environmental analysis for each subproject; compliance with
            the Pest Management Plan, which outlines the regular
            assessment of pesticide residues in irrigated agricultural
            production systems; establishment of strong collaboration
            between the project and the National Malaria Control
            Project; establishment of a dam unit within the Rural
            Engineering Department of the Ministry of Agriculture,
            responsible for advising producer organizations in the
            management of dams; and supervising such organizations in
            the development of operations and maintenance of
            environmental management plans, in addition to providing
            training and technical assistance to develop capacities.
